answerText: A Doll's House[10] The title character becomes pregnant after an affair with Erlend Nikulaussön and later dies of the bubonic plague in this trilogy by Sigrid Undset that includes The Wreath, Wife, and The Cross.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Minnesota A and Dartmouth A and South Detroit University | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name these works of Norwegian litereature, for ten points each.    [10] In this play by Henrik Ibsen, Nora Helmer is blackmailed by Krogstad after signing her father's signature in order to obtain enough money to pay for her husband's trip to Italy for his health.
